Dwarf:Dwarves suffer a 20% chance for failure every time they use any magical item except weapons, armor, shields, and (if the characters is a thief) items that duplicate thieving abilities. This penalty does not apply if the character is a battle mage or cleric using a cleric item.

Skills.sName: Dwarf:Infravision. Dwarves can see 60 feet in the dark.
Dwarf:Saving Throw bonus on saves vs. magic.
Dwarf:Saving Throw bonus save vs. poison.
Dwarf:+1 on to-hits vs. Orcs, half-orcs, Goblins, and Hobgoblins.
Dwarf:Ogres, Trolls, Ogre Magi, giants, and Titans suffer a -4 to hit dwarves.
Dwarf:Detect Grade or Slope in passage 1-5 on 1d6
Dwarf:Detect Sliding/shifting walls or rooms 1-4 on 1d6
Dwarf:Detect stonework traps, pits and dead falls 1-3 on 1d6

Dwarf:Dwarves suffer a 20% chance for failure every time they use any magical item except weapons, armor, shields, and (if the characters is a thief) items that duplicate thieving abilities. This penalty does not apply if the character is a battle mage or cleric using a cleric item.

Skills.sName: Half-ogre:Half-ogres have a natural Armor Class of 8.
Half-ogre:Half-ogres receive a +1 to saving throws versus poison.
Half-ogre:Starting Hit Dice are doubled at first level.
Half-ogre:+1 to attack and damage bonus with one melee weapon.
Half-ogre:Half-ogres qualify as large creatures and suffer more damage from many weapons.
Half-ogre:Certain smaller races enjoy combat bonuses against half-ogres.
Half-ogre:-2 penalty to attack rolls against dwarves.
Half-ogre:-2 penalty to attack rolls against gnomes.
Half-ogre:Their armor and other garb costs 200% that of humans.
